School Management System (Tkinter)

  • View page source

gui.qt_app_db module

PyQt5 GUI: School Management System (DB-enabled)

Uses both persistence methods: - SQLite (db/sqlite_repo.py) for live CRUD - JSON (src/persistence/json_store.py) for import/export

Run from project root:

python -m src.gui.qt_app_db

or

python src/gui/qt_app_db.py
